ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks

Class PngChunkFCTL

  • java.lang.Object
    • ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks.PngChunk
      • ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks.PngChunkMultiple
        • ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks.PngChunkFCTL

  • public class PngChunkFCTL
extends PngChunkMultiple
    fcTL chunk. For APGN, not PGN standard

    see https://wiki.mozilla.org/APNG_Specification#.60fcTL.60:_The_Frame_Control_Chunk

        public ChunkRaw createRawChunk()
